title: Solo 2 (was Guitar Solo Lite)
summary: Go Solo with Android's most popular guitar and start jamming wherever you are
developerAddress:
11 St Cloud Way
Port Kennedy
Western Australia
6172
Australia
description: UPDATE: All previous Solo apps (Solo full, Guitar Solo Lite and Solo Air) have been consolidated into this single app, Solo 2Finally play guitar like a pro!Solo 2 is the sequel to Android's popular guitar app, Solo.  It is a virtual guitar app that can be played with a connected companion device like a smart watch, or used used in standalone mode if you don't have a smart watch.    Use your phone to change chords and your watch to strum along to your favourite songs.  New features include: * Connect to an Android Wear or Tizen based smart watch for a more authentic guitar experience * An updated modern UI * Unlimited size chord layouts * Scrolling chord carousel for long chord progressions * Fret Mode with optional chord buttonsIt's ideal for jamming sessions when you don't have your guitar with you, or an excellent reference for when you do!Featuring:* Classical guitar, acoustic guitar and electric guitars, each with authentic sound* A huge chord library with chord diagrams - hear and see how each chord is played.* Create your own chords* Play along to any music loaded on your phone* Record what you play * Get chord and lyric overlays from the web - excellent for teaching yourself new songs to play* Play with a capo to fit your vocal range* Create, load and save chord layouts for your favourite songs* Customize the UI to fit your playing styleGet it now and unleash your inner air guitar rock star!
descriptionHTML:
UPDATE: All previous Solo apps (Solo full, Guitar Solo Lite and Solo Air) have been consolidated into this single app, Solo 2

Finally play guitar like a pro!

Solo 2 is the sequel to Android's popular guitar app, Solo.

It is a virtual guitar app that can be played with a connected companion device like a smart watch, or used used in standalone mode if you don't have a smart watch. Use your phone to change chords and your watch to strum along to your favourite songs.

New features include:
* Connect to an Android Wear or Tizen based smart watch for a more authentic guitar experience
* An updated modern UI
* Unlimited size chord layouts
* Scrolling chord carousel for long chord progressions
* Fret Mode with optional chord buttons

It's ideal for jamming sessions when you don't have your guitar with you, or an excellent reference for when you do!

Featuring:
* Classical guitar, acoustic guitar and electric guitars, each with authentic sound
* A huge chord library with chord diagrams - hear and see how each chord is played.
* Create your own chords
* Play along to any music loaded on your phone
* Record what you play
* Get chord and lyric overlays from the web - excellent for teaching yourself new songs to play
* Play with a capo to fit your vocal range
* Create, load and save chord layouts for your favourite songs
* Customize the UI to fit your playing style

Get it now and unleash your inner air guitar rock star!
comments: Suddenly I have to pay again. Trash app anyway

Not really fair having to pay again Paid for the original version of guitar solo and now this one comes along and have to pay again for essentially the same functionality . Sorry but that's a kick in the teeth for those who purchased the original. Update - developer responded but not in a consumer centric manner. Won't be using the app that I previously purchased. Clearly there's not even an incentive to upgrade.

Got worse after purchase Slow loading with every menu selection. Setting changes do not fix. From strum to sound, rhythm has lag. Not able to rotate or adjust to hold comfy grip. Samsung galaxy s3 worked better, please refund.
It works great, I absolutely love this app. At one point I had a slight issue and I emailed the developer and he got back to me right away and helped fixed the problem!

Not a free app.  And customer service is terrible I downloaded guitar solo. (Original app) It wasn't free either.  But I did a promotion to get full version. App has been updated a couple times and now the new version is $3 so I asked dev for help. Was told I didn't buy new version so I needed to download old version again.   So I went to find it.  Now it's $3 too. I asked dev for access to it again and was given sob story about taking money from his kids mouth and I should just buy it again.  Save your time and your money.  Uninstalling this garbage

this is legal? got it on my lg g4 ONLY so i could use it in tandem with my samsung Gs2 watch,( that the add says is supported). tried to sync gear 2s watch to app and it said i now have to wait for it to come to samsung store....Im,bummed.
recentChanges: Changed default Audio Engine for Samsung devices
